original_text: Saul immediately fell down on the ground and he lay there. He was very afraid because of what Samuel had said. Saul was also very weak because he had eaten nothing all that day and night.
korean_text: 사울이 갑자기 땅에 완전히 엎드러지니 이는 사무엘의 말로 말미암아 심히 두려워함이요 또 그의 기력이 다하였으니 이는 그가 하루 밤낮을 음식을 먹지 못하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: Saul immediately fell down on the ground
because of what Samuel had said
because he had eaten nothing all that day and night
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날과 밤 동안 아무것도 먹지 않았기 때문이었습니다
